outfit_data.top: A crisp white linen blouse with a relaxed fit and button-down front.
outfit_data.bottom: Cream-colored wide-leg seersucker trousers, slightly cropped at the ankle.
outfit_data.shoes: Tan leather espadrille wedges for a touch of summery flair.
outfit_data.extras: A taupe woven straw tote bag for carrying essentials. A delicate gold chain necklace adds a subtle shimmer.
